analysis: This update provides comprehensive lease information for a property located at 10 Miles Ave, Woodbridge, Connecticut, including details about rent, security deposit, utilities, repairs, late payments, inspection rights, occupancy rules, pet policies, contact information for the lessor, tenant names, additional terms, and governing law.
instructions: Create a new property at 10 Miles Ave, Woodbridge, Connecticut
Set the lease start date to 2024-07-01
Set the lease end date to 2025-06-30
Set the monthly rent amount to 2425
Set the total amount with pet fee to 2475
Set the payment due date to the 1st day of each calendar month, beginning 2024-06-24
Set the security deposit amount to 2600
Set the conditions for refund of the security deposit
Assign the lessee responsibility for electric, internet, and cable services
Assign the lessor responsibility for water and sewer costs
Assign the lessee responsibility for minor repairs up to 100
Assign the lessor responsibility for major repairs not due to lessee's negligence
Set the late fee to 50 for any rent payment not paid by the due date with a grace period of 10 days
Grant the lessor the right to inspect the premises with 24-hour notice
Set occupancy rules to allow single-family residence only and prohibit subletting or short-term rentals
Allow pets with a monthly fee of 50
Set the lessor name to Woodbridge Community Partners, LLC
Set the lessor phone number to 2032335859
Set the lessor email to Vadim.Tantsyura@outlook.com
Add tenants Rebecca Rodriguez, John Cain, and Jacqueline Cain
Set additional terms regarding maintenance, reporting leaks, smoking prohibition, and pest control responsibilities
Set the governing law to the laws of the State of Connecticut
